dialogue_content.speaker: Interviewer
dialogue_content.text: I'd love to hear about your time working in the fashion closet. What was that like?

dialogue_content.speaker: Interviewer
dialogue_content.text: It sounds like the fashion closet was a vibrant and dynamic place. What were some of the challenges you faced back then?

dialogue_content.speaker: Interviewer
dialogue_content.text: That must have been hard, keeping everything in check. So when did things change for you in your career?

dialogue_content.speaker: Interviewer
dialogue_content.text: It sounds like you started seeing changes in the industry before anyone really knew what was coming. What did those early editorial responsibilities look like?

dialogue_content.speaker: Interviewer
dialogue_content.text: I'd love to know how that chapter of your career came to a close. How did you transition out of the editorial role?

dialogue_content.speaker: Interviewer
dialogue_content.text: That must have been quite a transition, stepping back from something you loved. How did you feel about moving towards a more digital world?

dialogue_content.speaker: Interviewer
dialogue_content.text: It sounds like your journey with print and digital was quite transformative. Can you share more about the challenges you faced during the shift from print to digital?

dialogue_content.speaker: Interviewer
dialogue_content.text: That must have been quite the learning curve. How did you manage to adapt to these new digital demands while maintaining the quality you were used to in print?

dialogue_content.speaker: Interviewer
dialogue_content.text: It's wonderful to hear how you embraced the changes. What were some specific challenges your team faced during this period?

dialogue_content.speaker: Interviewer
dialogue_content.text: It sounds like staying flexible and open-minded was key. How did these changes affect your personal connection to the work?

dialogue_content.speaker: Interviewer
dialogue_content.text: So, Helen, now that you've stepped back from the hustle and bustle of the magazine world, how have you been spending your time these days?

dialogue_content.speaker: Interviewer
dialogue_content.text: Reading sounds like such a lovely way to spend your time. What kind of books do you find yourself reaching for now?

dialogue_content.speaker: Interviewer
dialogue_content.text: It sounds like you've really embraced this new chapter in your life. How has reading influenced your perspective now that you're not in the thick of the magazine world anymore?

dialogue_content.speaker: Interviewer
dialogue_content.text: It's wonderful to hear how much joy reading brings you. How do you feel your experiences in the magazine world have influenced your appreciation for literature now?

dialogue_content.speaker: Interviewer
dialogue_content.text: Before we finish, Helen, I'd love to hear if there's a final lesson or piece of wisdom you'd like to share from your journey through the world of print and digital, and now into retirement.
